{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10947v1", "title": "Improved MST3 Encryption scheme based on small Ree groups", "summary": "This article presents an encryption scheme based on the small Ree groups. We
propose utilizing the small Ree group structure to enhance the overall security
parameters of the encryption scheme. By extending the logarithmic signature to
encompass the entire group and modifying the encryption algorithm, we have
developed robust protection against sequential key recovery attacks.", "main_category": "cs.CR", "categories": "cs.CR,math.GR", "published": "2025-04-15T07:51:56Z"}
